pr_title: DHFPROD-4532: impl for invoking the flow by taking params from req body

timeline.bodyText: This is good - is it the default that multiple params will be sent as a JSON object to a Function? I know that's how Lambda works in AWS.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: For a POST request, we can get a handle to the entire request body as a valid json string. I'm converting the string into JSON object here. FYI
replies.author: vgouraba

timeline.bodyText: For consistency elsewhere, can you use these names for the params - "host", "username", "password", "flowName", and "steps.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: modified code to use the names: host/username/password/flowName/steps.
replies.author: vgouraba
